title: Is Jawa.gg a SCAM?
description: Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   I decided to put Jawa to the test by buying both a pre-built system and parts to build my own PC. While there are some pros and cons to consider, Jawa does seem to be a legit option for PC enthusiasts on a budget.  Chapter Titles: 0:00 Ordering 3:28 GPU Trade In 5:09 Cheapest Gaming PC 8:01 Power Supply 10:27 Motherboard Combo 13:04 Graphics Card 14:09 Case 15:18 PC Build 16:06 Which Gaming PC is Best? 19:00 Conclusion
